message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value to you at $15,000, I am confident it will also be a valuable addition to your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $12,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring a fair return for the product's worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
